dashboard.type_name_workspace: To continue deleting, type the name of the workspace to delete into the box below:

error.payment_failed_desc: We couldn't process your {app_name} payment for workspace {workspace}

feature_limit.number_brands_accounts_desc: Each brand provides full brand management, where the user connects all social media accounts associated with that brand.
feature_limit.max_account: Single brand account limit reached.\nMax limit: {value}
feature_limit.scheduled_posts_desc: The number of scheduled posts users can have at once.
feature_limit.max_scheduled_posts: Maximum limit of scheduled posts reached.\nMax limit: {value}.
feature_limit.workspace_members_desc: The maximum number of members in a workspace.
feature_limit.workspace_storage_desc: The maximum storage size of a workspace (MB).
feature_limit.max_storage: The storage limit reached.\nMax limit: {value} MB
feature_limit.ai_credits_reached: Your current plan's AI credits limit has been reached.\nMax limit: {limit}.

finance.confirm_delete_receipt: Are you sure you want to delete this receipt?
finance.confirm_delete_receipts: Are you sure you want to delete selected receipts?
finance.paid_date_time_required: Paid date and time is required
finance.prorate_charges: Prorate charges when swapping between plans
finance.swap_plans_invoice_user: Swap plans and immediately invoice the user instead of waiting for their next billing cycle
finance.update_payment_information: We were unable to process your payment for your subscription. Please update your payment information to continue using our service.

general.name: Name
general.try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.

onboarding.click_to_verify: Please click the button below to verify your email address.
onboarding.no_account_no_action: If you did not create an account, no further action is required.
onboarding.confirm_email: Before getting started, please verify your email address by clicking on the link we emailed to you.
onboarding.email_verification_sent: Email verification link has been sent to your email address.

panel.add_admin_role: Adding a user as an owner who does not belong to this workspace will automatically attach them with the admin role.
panel.blank_no_change_password: Leave blank if you do not want to change the password
panel.number_days_trial: Number of days to offer a trial
panel.scripts_chats: Enter scripts for chats or other customer support tools.
panel.trial_offer: Offer trial periods without collecting the user's payment method
panel.config_pay_plat: Configure the payment platform for subscriptions.
panel.pay_plat_disabled: You have not activated any payment platform. Your users will not be able to subscribe.
panel.twitter_api_workspace_docs_tip: Train your customers how to configure the Twitter API
panel.delete_unverified_users_desc: The system will automatically delete users who have not verified their email address after 30 days.
panel.allow_account_deletion_desc: Allows users to permanently delete their account and all associated data.

plan.access_all_features: By default, the plan offers access to all features. You can add limits.
plan.can_disable_plan: Instead of deleting, you can disable it.
plan.confirm_delete_plan: Are you sure you want to delete this plan?
plan.define_plans: Manage subscription plans for your customers.
plan.free_plan_exists: A free plan already exists. You can only have one free plan.
plan.keep_old_plan: Nevermind, I'll keep my old plan
plan.plan_not_created: The plan was not created. Checked the form.
plan.plan_not_updated: The plan was not updated. Checked the form.
plan.limits_reached: You have added all possible limits.

service.third_party_services_desc: This page is for storing the credentials for third party services.

subscription.cant_swap_plan: You can't swap plan on a non recurring subscription
subscription.cant_subscribe_plan_have_active_sub: You can't subscribe to a plan while you have an active subscription.
subscription.can_cancel_sub: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Your subscription will remain active until the end of  the current billing period.
subscription.confirm_cancel_sub: Are you sure you want to cancel subscription for this workspace?
subscription.confirm_cancel_generic_sub: Are you sure you want to cancel generic subscription for this workspace?
subscription.confirm_downgrade_free_plan: Are you sure you want to downgrade to free plan?
subscription.cancel_delete_sub: This action will cancel and delete the current subscription (if it exists).
subscription.dont_have_active_sub: You don't have an active subscription
subscription.empty_config: Leave empty to use default trial days config
subscription.no_active_sub: It's looks like you do not have an active subscription.
subscription.reason_workspace_locked: This is due to the cancellation of the subscription or because an invoice has remained unpaid.
subscription.sub_downgraded: Your subscription has been downgraded to the free plan.
subscription.trial_end_upgrade: To continue using {app_name}, please consider upgrading.
subscription.workspace_locked: Sorry, this workspace has been locked.
subscription.features_access_lost: You won't be able to use the features of the current plan anymore.
subscription.confirm_resume: Are you sure you want to resume subscription for this workspace?
subscription.platform_not_support_resume: This payment platform does not support resuming subscription.
subscription.not_found: This workspace does not have a subscription.
subscription.need_cancel_to_swap: To change subscription plan, you need to cancel the current subscription and create a new one.
subscription.cannot_resume: You can only resume subscriptions that are paused or in the grace period.

team.confirm_cancel_invitation: Are you sure you want to cancel invitation for {email}?
team.limited_edit: Can access and edit everything except configuration section.
team.invite_members: Invite new members by email to join your workspace.
team.invited_join_workspace: You have been invited to join the {name} workspace.
team.user_already_member: This user is already a member of this workspace.
team.viewer_access: Can access everything except configuration section, but cannot edit, schedule posts.

theme.primary_color_required: The primary color field is required.

user.confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
user.confirm_delete_users: Are you sure you want to delete selected users?
user.detach_user_desc: Are you sure you want to detach {user} from {workspace}?
user.not_meet_password_requirements: The {attribute} does not meet password requirements.
user.admin_access: This option will provide administrator access (Admin Console).
user.users_create_workspaces: Allow users to create multiple workspaces

chart.drag_chart: You can drag the chart to zoom.

workspace.confirm_delete_workspace: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?
workspace.confirm_delete_workspaces: Are you sure you want to delete selected workspaces?
workspace.data_delete: All data will be deleted and if it has a subscription, it will be canceled immediately.
workspace.delete_data: Deleting this workspace will delete all data.
workspace.detach_workspace_desc: Are you sure you want to detach {workspace} from {user}?
workspace.workspace_no_active_subscription: This workspace does not have an active subscription
